name: Chance Worthy
text:
I can't say enough how much I enjoy and love going to this salon. I've always bounced around every time I need to get a haircut. I'm kinda too picky when it comes to the hair style I want to achieve. Every time I wanted to try something new I can always count on Pure being on board and willing to lend a very knowledgeable hand on how we can go about it achieving the style I want. I also love more than anything to relationship I have with my Stylist, Evan! Oh gosh I mean you can't ask for a better stylist. I love sending pictures when I can of new styles to try out. He has truly become a friend of mine. I would highly recommend going to this salon.
Overall great environment, excellent staff, and you can count on walking out look A list good!

name: Kitty Harris
text: I tended to jump around for haircuts until my daughter urged me to try Pure. As long as Evan is there it is my place! Members' of my family have gone there for massages, waxing, hair coloring, body wraps, eyelash extensions and whatever else they wanted! I have never had to wait. Exquisite attention to detail-concern for what I, the favorite customer, desire. That is how I feel when I am there!

name: PAISLEY Wright
text: Pure Salon & Spa offers the highest standard of service of any Salon in the area. Pure has a mobile app that list all the services and the prices. The Staff goes above and beyond to make sure everyone is given the utmost attention needed to make all the services offered a great experience.

name: Preston Taylor
text: I would highly recommend anyone in the area to check out Pure Salon & Spa. Their staff is amazing and the atmosphere is great! I wouldn't go anywhere else to get my hair done.

name: Susan Chandler
text:
I have worked out my whole life. Hope the
Owner of Fitness Advantage is one of the very BEST! I look forward to my weekly workouts. Hope inspires, with fun & laughter to do all we can possibly do. She is one amazing woman. The variety of yoga, low impact, weight training,
pilates, & much more keeps us wanting more.

name: Michelle Parr
text: This gym is like no other I have ever been to. It doesn't matter your age or your size the ladies welcome you. It motivates you to workout harder and to be the best you that you can be. I love my gym!!!

name: Mallory Richardson
text: Fitness Advantage is the perfect gym for a woman wanting to get in shape. Hope is amazing and is knowledgeable in all aspects of fitness. Plus, she's a great time! Fitness Advantage isn't just a gym for women, it is an escape for some "me time." Hope and her gym have enabled me to live a healthier lifestyle, and I have also gained a groups of friends that will last a lifetime.

name: Lisa Kowalsky
text: I am so thankful to have been invited by a dear friend to try Fitness Advantage because now I am hooked! Hope's classes are much like having a personal trainer because she leads, instructs, encourages, & pushes us onward! If you want a healthy body it is so important especially as you age to fit regular exercise into your daily routine & Hope makes that very doable!

name: Pam Rennhack
text:
This is a great ladies only gym
Very personal and passionate about helping others
Thank you Hope!!

name: Joyce Edwards
text: I love this ladies fitness workout, yoga, Pilates and many other fun, healthful activities that Hope Richardson can think up to keep you happy and motivated so you have the desire to keep coming back to stay healthy and have more energy.  Thanks for all you do Hope!

name: Amanda Payne
text: Great group of ladies!

name: Lisa Baity
text: I have been going to Fitness Advantage for over three years.  Never miss a MWF class!  Hope Richardson is an amazing gal.  She is a Personal Trainer, a certified Massage Therapist and certified in all the classes she teaches. Fitness Advantage is an all woman's gym and it caters to all things women which is delightful.  There is no judgement only encouragement, a lot of laughs and great exercise.  Hope is a master at her craft and has been in this business 30+ years.  It is the best investment I have ever made for my personal health and well being.  I have a great group of friends from the gym.  This is an establishment that is community minded.  Monthly we help non profits, people in need, teachers with school supplies, animal shelters etc.. Hope is a true believer in her members and the Dothan community!  I encourage you to  join us!

name: Rosemary Millar
text: All ladies! Owner is knowledgeable and helpful and will set up a personal plan just for you.

name: Linda Hays
text: Love working out with this crew!!!

name: Eric Fulton
text: Very professional _and the first time anyone's ever gotten my flat top right! kudos

name: Krista Angrisano
text: Linda is amazing! My daughter went from long hair to a short pixie bob, and Linda did a flawless job. She took her time and made sure that my daughter walked out of there feeling wonderful! A++ service

name: Nicole Spearman
text: Been going to Kuttin up for years! Followed them at different locations, wouldn't go anywhere else. Queen is THE best. She is fast efficient and SO talented. Me and my husband see her.

name: Caroline Burress
text: Ashley Gray did a great job coloring my hair. I went from shab to fab in a few hours. If you are looking for a great hair stylist, stop by and see her. Love my new color and style.

name: Crystal Huey (Crystal Beckom)
text: They really took care of my kids! These ladies know what they are doing

name: Kristie Branch
text: Poor service! Over priced!! Hair dresser did not listen to her customer my child telling her that the clippers were pulling their hair and hurting them. Hair dresser continues to cut hair as my child is informing her that it is hurting them. (My child has had brain surgery and his head is sensitive. I told hair dresser the issue and she continued to cause pain to my child as she was cutting his hair)

name: Zachary Vick
text: Queen is definitely a queen thanks for hooking my hair up babe definitely booking again

name: Katherine Maria
text: Went in just to get my hair trimmed.  Though she was super sweet, Shannon pulled out one of my piercings with her comb and it bled. My haircut is very choppy and uneven. She was not paying attention. She answered two phone calls during my cut. Another woman was brushing her teeth in the salon with customers. Overall terrible experience and now I have to fix this mess of a haircut. :/ I wish I would've said something while I was there. Very disappointed. :(

name: Nora Pence
text: Not very happy I asked for layers and daphne  didn't layer my hair at all and the back of both mine and my childs neck are bad razor burned I'll be going somewhere else to have my layers done

name: Nikki Magana
text: Shouldn't hang up on potential customers

name: Sherri Middleton
text: Bob Branyon has been cutting and coloring my hair for years and I'm always happy with the results.

name: Lynn Caddell
text: Shannon made my hair look and feel amazing!!

name: Ann Marie “Mary Ann” Melofsky-Bryant
text: Everyone wonderful, Lamar, Corrine, Daphany and Becky were Great! Everyone is Great as well.

name: Jason Wilcox
text: Shannon is the best.

name: David Hines
text: I’ve been getting my hair cut here for over a year now. I’ve never had a bad experience, people are friendly, so they’ll have my business  👍

name: Holly L
text: Great experience.... Thank so much Corinne!

name: Angela Buckley
text: Brooke is amazing, she always does a fabulous job!

name: LinniTofu _
text: My hair looks great would recommend

name: Carin Lake
text: No complaints per se...I should have asked if they had increased their prices after their remodel. Place looks great, has awesome shop next door. Every one was friendly and service was good. Just a trim on my hair took about 5 minutes. Not layers or bangs. Just cut 5in off... Wasn't expecting to have to pay $25 ($30 with tip). Haven't been since last year with my girls..I was expecting  $15 like it was before...next time I'll go pay $8 for it elsewhere. I'm not complicated. Hack it off, make it look even and let me go.

name: barbara bowden
text: I HAVE LET LISA B. BE MY "HAIR DOCTOR" SINCE THE 1980'S. I WAS HER LABOR AND DELIVERY NURSE! I NOW DRIVE A FEW ADDITIONAL MILES TO GET MY HAIR DONE. BELIEVE ME, IT'S WELL WORTH IT. SHE IS THE ONLY ONE WHO CAN CUT AND STYLE MY HAIR, THAT MAKES ME FEEL LIKE I HAVE HAD A BEAUTY DAY. THANKS LISA FOR ALWAYS KNOW WHAT I NEED!!!😊

name: Wesley Hacker
text: Great place for Kuttin' up while you get a haircut.

name: Hannah Cargile
text: Queen did an awesome job cutting my hair this morning. I just walked in and they had no problem fitting me in! THANK YOU QUEEN

name: Jeremy (Momsboy32)
text: Love the newly Remodeled place. This place is great. All the people that work here are great, especially Queen. She is great stylist for men and women.

name: Timothy Abney
text: Courteous, friendly and professional staff.

name: Dustin Reaves
text: Have gone three times for walk in mens cut and paid three different prices for the same cut. Not really the time to dispute cost after the fact but would be nice for standardized published pricing for basic services. Haitcuts have always been top notch.

name: Stephanie Isbell
text: Different visits have left me with an inconsistent review. I definitely love my hairdresser Kelsey Chamblee. She takes the time to truly listen and aims to give me what I want. But she also is honest with her advice. If she believes something wouldn't be suitable for you, she will tell you.  Rather than just agree. I truly appreciate that in a friend. She is always up beat even when she hasn't had the best of days. Some people there act as if they are better than they are. They stare and act too good to speak. I hope that part changes. I have spoke to others and people have even said that is why they will never go back. We will see how it turns out. 😊😊😊

name: Gina Huie
text: Absolutely loved my cut, color, and style by Bob! I have followed him since he worked in Centerpoint during the 80's. Great place to get a wonderful cut, color, a whole new look. Super friendly and prices are great! I would definitely recommend them to anyone!

name: Stephen Foster
text: Nice cut, walked in. Prices not posted. $25 for basic haircut, not washed or any extras.

name: Jeremy Peoples
text: Very friendly people and and sweet and they do a great job

name: Carolyn Davidson
text: Love Amy Mashburn at Kuttin Up!  She is great with all hair types and all ages!

name: Heather Brownlee
text: Brooke Wilson has done my hair for three years! I like to do a lot of funky stuff with my hair and I know she will always do a great job! She is very sweet I highly recommend her!

name: Jean Gannett
text: I love this place! They have super nice staff and reasonable prices! My favorite hairstylist is Linda! Ask for her if you can, you won't regret it!

name: Jeff Roberts
text: Ask for Brooke! She does a great job on my daughters' hair!

name: Matthew Williamson
text: Love the remodeled space.  Numerous talented stylists. Linda, in particular, is excellent.

name: Katherine Keath
text:
Great experience! Loved the staff!

Everyone is very nice!

name: Brittany Skinner
text: Love getting my hair done here. All the ladies here know what they're doing and really do a good job.

name: George Godfrey
text: Absolutely wonderful thanks Lisa

name: Jeremy Couch
text: always a pleasure at kuttin up. great group of people

name: Patricia “Patti” Long
text: They do great coloring and highlights and cuts. My hair is naturally wavy and curly and this is the only place I can get my hair cut to work with my curls.

name: Megan England
text: I have gone to this salon for a long time and Linda is the best!!! I would recommend her to everyone! My friends have went to her and my mom.. They all were happy with the way their hair turned out. She does the best short hair cuts...

name: Lamar Starling
text: Good hair cut every time! I have used 5 different stylist here & it seems they are ALL, good at cutting hair.

name: Debbie Nations
text: Linda Childers is wonderful.  Feel very comfortable at Kuttin Up.  Once there, you never want to leave.

name: Maegan Johnson
text: Just got my hair cut and styled this time, and I absolutely LOVED it, and the price was very reasonable!! Definitely going back and recommend! :):)

name: Haley Scott
text: Had a great experience! Will visit again.

name: Skyler Winslett
text: Only place our family goes!

name: Mark Ross
text: Fantastic stylist! Lisa Brenner is knowledgeable, creative and fun!

name: Justin Childs
text: Ask for Kristen or Queen. Great stylists! The girl who washes hair is also very talented.

name: Sherry Hawkins
text: Loved this place. I got the best haircut, and they took their time. Till you was happy.

name: You Sexy Thing You
text: Kevin Lankford and Charity Carden are the best in the business. Unfortunately it appears neither no longer works at Kuttin' Up. This is a huge loss, especially since it appears they no longer serve Trussville. They are truly gifted hair artists. If you luck up on finding them, don't hesitate. You won't believe how good your hair will look and feel. They had my hair practically spun into silk. Thank you, Kevin and Charity. Hope to find you again one of these years.

name: Kellie Z
text: I was in Trussville visiting family and called Kuttin Up to see if I could get a same day appointment for a haircut.  Tara was able to fit me in a couple of hours later and gave me a great cut.  Thanks Tara!

name: H T
text: way wayy too expensive... very sweet ladies but nearly $300 later i had some basic caramel highlights when I asked for an ombre.. could have done it myself honestly and she also tried to bayalage but it looked so streaky like tiger stripes.......The girl said we would have to do a couple session process.. well the first time i paid about $150 for the “ombre” then another $150 and my hair looked the same as when i walked into the place that day. She never told me i would have to pay $150 again and i honestly shouldnt have... She also rushed and seemed like she just wanted to go home

name: Nichole
text: Always great stylists, walk-ins welcome, great salon!

name: Bill Corbett
text: Lisa and her team are great. Been getting my hair cut here for about 25 years

name: Marcia Caldwell
text: Took a male friend here for a shave & haircut.Very disappointed with shave-left stubble-wasn't smooth. Good haircut though. Think $65 was very excessive!

name: Traci King
text: Myself, 2 daughters and Nana all use this hair salon and none of us have ever been disappointed!

name: Cindy
text: Great haircuts and good prices. Jennifer is great.

name: Chris Chamblee
text: My hair cut was awesome but  waited a long time for a 10 min hair cut still good though

name: Lisa Johnson
text: Go see Erin. She cut and colored my hair, it's the best haircut and color I've ever had.

name: Deborah Franks
text: Love my nail girl, she is fab but salon need some serious cleaning

name: Ryan Wadsworth
text: Everyone needs to go see Brooke Wilson to get the best haircut in town!

name: Charles
text: Great cut, friendly service. Kim was very nice and did a great job.

name: Michele Di Pasquale
text: Hair color was good but $90 for touching up my roots I thought was a bit excessive.

name: Chuck Boyd
text: Different, but good. I always enjoy going.

name: chito dlp
text: Love my high light recommend Linda Childers

name: Sheila Griffin
text: Love Savannah.

name: alan diaz
text: Eh. Ppl are nice but kinda expensive and not to good with guy hair

name: Patricia Monte
text: Love Bob

name: Tia Bailey
text: Wrost place ever!! If I could upload pictures of my hair right now (with chemical burns) I would. Not only did she let bleach sit on my scalp for over an hour but she put two different toners in my hair, leaving chemicals on my head for a total of 1 hour and 53 minutes. My hair color is white, brass, orange, and yellow. I came in to touch up my roots.....

name: Mo
text: Daphne is fantastic.

name: John Humphries
text: See Shannon Pearce for a great style !

name: Mike Harbuck
text: There always seem to be a very attractive female at the front desk...which are very rude.Tmmlj77

name: RotN Alabama
text: Great place.

name: Rhonnie Graham
text: Classy salon

name: Carla Grego
text: The best

name: Joe Mathis
text: Renee did great!

name: Russ
text: Linda at Kuttin Up has cut my hair for years. She and  everyone else are great and experienced

name: Tammy Henson
text: Love Lauren Thompson

name: Jamie Pugh
text: Robyn is amazing!

name: nicole norman
text: Kevin is the best!

name: Dani Nicole
text: They went that extra mile to do my hair, that being said the edge cut that I got doesn't look like the picture but I still like it

name: Elizabeth Logan
text: Kate is the best!

name: Victoria Hitchcock
text: Love Sandy!!!!!

name: Bob johnson
text: Bad attitude !!!!!! Front desk person was rude ! They gave me some young girl to cut my hair , think she was about 20 , talked about her boyfriend and going out partying , this place is a mess !!! Unprofessional, never never never goin back !!!!!!! I give this place a big FAT 0

name: Lynda
text: Lisa is a great hair dresser
